message: First post!   I keep melting IR Sensors. If i do a setup like http://www.ladyada.net/images/sensors/irremotetest.gif the LED stays off. The IR Sensor gets really hot and dies.  I'm using 5V form an Arduino as powersource.
If i put strong resistor in front of the IR (right leg)  the LED shines, the IR lives, but doesn't work.
Is this just a question of finding the right resistor?
Solved: My IR Sensors turned out to have ground on leg 3 and Vin on the middle one.
@kioopi wow, that's a horrible problem! Glad you found your solution :)
